title: Font used by YouTuber GameChap
content:
I have searched for this font everywhere, and I can't find it!

Font: 

 Bandal 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120653/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Utah Teapot

comments.content:
You can find it as **Bandal** or **Open Dotum**
